code: import{ADD_ITEM,CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART,TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN,REMOVE_ITEM}from'./cart.constants';export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearItemFromCart=function clearItemFromCart(id){return{type:CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:id};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(id){return{type:REMOVE_ITEM,payload:id};};
